professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in RAC, ASM, Data Guard, Golden Gate Replication, Performance Tuning, and TDE Implementation.

key_responsibilities: including RAC/ASM configuration on RedHat systems.
Implemented Data Guard solutions with DG Broker and Active Data Guard.
Configured Golden Gate replication for bidirectional data transfer.
Performed database performance monitoring and tuning using AWR and Explain Plan.
Managed database growth and optimized storage allocation.
Migrated databases to ASM and configured RAC/ASM on RedHat Enterprise Linux.
Implemented Data Pump for database reorganization and migration between Oracle versions.
Defined backup strategies with daily hot backups and weekly cold backups.

technical_skills:
Oracle Database Administration",
            "RAC/ASM Configuration",
            "Data Guard Implementation",
            "Golden Gate Replication",
            "Database Performance Tuning",
            "Transparent Data Encryption (TDE)",
            "Database Migration and Optimization
